main.name: Ryan Hu
main.occupation: Toronto based first-year engineering student at the University of Waterloo.
main.bio: I'm an 1B Managment Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. I am an avid hacker and I always enjoy learning new technologies to improve my skillset. I am still seeking my first co-op for the term of Summer 2021. Apart from programming, I am an avid car enthusiast, ski instructor and Raptors fan. Feel free to get in touch with me!

education.description: Relevant Coursework: Java Programming | Electrical Ciruits | Excel manipulation & VBA Programming
